DoseControl® Dosimetry System

The ideal solution for industrial radiation processing applications. For use with B3 radiochromic, FWT radiochromic, CTA film, and Harwell PMMA dosimeters. Dose range 1-150 kGy for B3, 1-100 kGy for FWT, 1-55 kGy for Amber/Red Perspex PMMA, 10-300 kGy for CTA. Use outside these dose ranges may be possible.


Contact Sales


The DoseControl® dosimetry system integrates a powerful 21CFR Part 11 conforming dosimetry software with a Thermo Scientific spectrophotometer, controlling the measurement process and making it simple to create and maintain dosimetry records. This system is a versatile solution for industrial routine dosimetry applications, and can accommodate several different types of dosimeters, such as B3, FWT, CTA and PMMA (Red and Amber Perspex).

Makes operations efficient and audits easy.

dashboard

Powerful Software

Provides step-by-step management of the dosimetry workflow.

Designed to meet the needs of industrial dosimetry.

Combines speed and reliability.

21 CFR part 11 compliant.

done_outline

Uniformity of measurements

Every measurement follows the same process.

Eliminates user error.

verified_user

Ensures Measurement Integrity

B3 DoseStix dosimeter measurements linked simultaneously to scanned barcode ID number.

Absorbance and thickness of Red and Amber Perspex are linked because they are measured simultaneously in the same holder.

Quick, controlled, traceable dose measurements.


The DoseControl® dosimetry system scans the dosimeter ID at the time of measurement, assuring the dose is traceable to a specific dosimeter.

1. Easy to Use

  • Simply place the dosimeter in the holder and press the "Measure" button.

  • The system automatically captures all the information related to the measurement.

  • DoseControl prompts the user through each step.

2. Controlled Measurement Process

DoseControl enforces a consistent measurement routine for each user.

  • Configure measurement and process parameters in advance, and then lock in this process in place for other users.

  • Limit the number of re-reads (re-measurement of dosimeters), and enforce specific reasons and methods for re-reads.

  • Reduces user error and minimizes risk.

3. Permanent Record of Measurement Data

DoseControl captures all information related to the process, dosimeter measurements, user logins, dates/time. This information cannot be deleted or removed. Any changes are recorded.

  • Dosimeter absorbance

  • Dose calculation

  • Dosimeter ID

  • Who made the measurement - User ID

  • Date/time of the measurement

  • Measurement metadata - the calibration, the spectrophotometer S/N, the dosimeter batch, the irradiation pathway.

  • All activities - any re-measurements, any comments, any changes.

  • Any process parameters - as defined by you.

Complete Audit Trail Capabilities


DoseControl® features a filterable audit trail which allows you to find any record of any historical activity in the software. Save and print your audit in a secure PDF format.

1. Filter Audit Trail

  • Dosimeter ID - Filter and list any and all measurements, re-reads, edits, etc. for a specific dosimeter.

  • User - Find and list all activities performed by a user.

  • Instrument, Pathway - Find a complete history of activities for a specific spectrophotometer or irradiation pathway (such as a specific E-beam).

  • Date range - Find a complete history of activities for a given date range.

2. Quickly Save/Print an Audit Report

DoseControl enforces a consistent measurement routine for each user.

  • Click the "Print" icon to produce a report of your filtered audit trail.

  • Save or print the secure (non-alterable) PDF report.

  • Excellent way to investigate issues in your dosimetry process or a specific measurement.

Dosimetry Reports Designed for the Radiation Processing Industry.

Flexible and configurable. Secure PDF and MS Excel formats.



  • You control what types of reports are output from DoseControl, and what information is contained in a report.

  • Multiple types of reports can be output from DoseControl: Routine dosimetry, Dose Mapping, Ebeam and Gamma Calibrations, Ebeam testing, etc.

  • Output secure PDF reports as a permanent, uneditable record.

  • Modify the Excel report template to meet the needs of your specific process.

Your choice of Spectrophotometer

Powerful and flexible software to create and maintain FDA 21 CFR Part 11 compliant dosimetry records.


B3, FWT, CTA and Perspex dosimeters

Thermo Scientific Evolution 220 Spectrophotometer

High performance, state-of-the-art spectrophotometer, with specialized dosimeter holders and internal barcode reader. Ideal for high volume dosimetry users. Excellent choice for users that want on-site serviceability.

  • Performance verification (P.V.) Module in DoseControl - automated daily P.V. checks of instrument with audit trail and PDF reports.

  • You can leave the lid open during measurements. The dosimeter holder system is designed to block stray light.

  • Long-life xenon lamp, which means limited downtime. (3 year guarantee, average life 5 years with 24/7/365 operation.) No changing the lamp. Done by Thermo technician.

  • No instrument warm up time. You can begin measurements after a 3 minute initialization from a cold start.

  • Comprehensive calibration and performance verification capabilities - empowers you to do this yourself without needing to call a tech or send the unit to Thermo. Re-calibrate the wavelength using the internal Xenon lamp, a Mercury Lamp accessory, or automated CVC accessory. Use the Thermo INSIGHT for complete performance verification testing.

B3 and FWT dosimeters

Thermo Scientific Genesys 30 Spectrophotometer

High quality spectrophotometer with specialized dosimeter holders and internal barcode scanner. Next generation instrument for dosimetry, replacing the Genesys 20 model. Stable and durable, the GENESYS 30 is an ideal, high-performing instrument for dosimetry.

  • You can leave the lid open during measurements. The dosimeter holder system is designed to block stray light.

  • Simplified lamp change process. Lamp is pre-aligned and you simply insert it into place.

  • Tungsten-halogen lamp rated at 1000 hours of use.



Powerful and flexible software to create and maintain FDA 21 CFR Part 11 compliant dosimetry records.

done_outline

Electronic Audit Trail

  • Permanent, no-editable records.

  • System records all measurement activity - who did what, when, and why.

  • Filterable audit trail reports - filter and itemize a history of dosimetry activity by dates, dosimeter ID, user login, reader, etc.

  • Create secure PDF report of Audit Trail results.

done_outline

Quality Dosimetry Reports

  • Version control of dosimetry measurement reports (print, export data).

  • Secure, non-editable PDF reports.

  • Standard or customizable reports formats.

  • Flexible Excel report templates - create your own templates specific to your process. Easily upload new template into the software.

About DoseControl® Software

done_outline

Controls User Activity

  • Uniformity in measurement results – Every measurement follows the same process, as defined by your software administrator.

  • Eliminates user error by controlling workflow and eliminating decisions. Easy to use with a modern user interface in Windows®.

  • Verification of spectrophotometer serial number, wavelength, and spectral bandwidth with each measurement to match dosimeter batch calibration configuration.

  • User access and permissions control via local admin or LDAP with active directory.

  • Dosimeter re-read policy controlled by the admin.

done_outline

Powerful Modules and Integration Capabilities

  • Integrate DoseControl with your other systems. Import data into DoseControl, or export data from DoseControl - no expensive customizations necessary. For Enterprise License users.

  • Performance Verification Module: Guides the user step-by-step to perform a "daily check" of the Evolution 220 instrument, to verify the reader's wavelength and photometric accuracy.

  • Product Specification Module: The user simply chooses a product name from the drop-down list, and the software automatically populates the report header information with your process information for that product. The admin can setup process specifications for hundreds of various products. Prevents user error and makes dosimetry report setup easy for your technicians.
